Have You Seen The TV Ads For Monster Rancher Games?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Have You Seen The TV Ads For Monster Rancher Games?
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 8, 2000 - 09:26 pm:

Tecmo's boards announced today that they are airing TV ads for the MR games. I was wondering if anyone could tell me about times or channels? And, what did you think?

By Foster on Tuesday, August 8, 2000 - 09:45 pm:

yes, l have seen them, and they are horrible. the images flash too quick, but and they show scenes from the game boy game (i think) and horrible scenes from a battle in Mr2,.. I mean they are just plain bad.

If I had not already been hooked on Monster Ranching,. I would probably run away. it Doesnt even really explain the idea behind the game at all. I was/am terribly disappointed.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 8, 2000 - 09:54 pm:

I wonder if they understand what it is that really draws us into the game? Maybe you should reply to Tecmo, at the Tecmoinc message board.
